info.name: Black Tumblr - DistortedOutsider
info.description: Changed color scheme of the dashboard to black and white with a blue notification bubble. The tumblr radar is now hidden.
info.additionalInfo: I haven't found a problem that bothers me much or makes it unusable so there may not be an update unless someone asks for a change or I decide to try perfecting it. If you have any questions or feedback I'd suggest sending me an ask on my tumblr because I don't often check my userstyles account.
